problem_7.goal: throw away a cola can, a banana peel and a rotting apple in the rubbish bin, then mop the floor in the kitchen and living room and clean the mop immediately after cleaning each room

problem_8.description: task related to house cleaning but banana peel and rotting apple are missing
problem_8.goal: throw away a cola can, a banana peel and a rotting apple in the rubbish bin, then mop the floor in the kitchen and living room and clean the mop immediately after cleaning each room

actions.name: move_to
actions.description: The robot moves from one room to another. Arguments: robot, starting room, destination room. Preconditions: The robot must be in the starting room. Postconditions: The robot is no longer in the starting room and is now in the destination room.

actions.name: grab
actions.description: The robot picks up a grabbable object in a room. Arguments: robot, grabbable object, room. Preconditions: The robot and the object must be in the same room, and the robot must be free (not holding anything). Postconditions: The robot is holding the object and is no longer free, and the object is no longer in the room.

actions.name: drop
actions.description: The robot drops a grabbable object in a room. Arguments: robot, grabbable object, room. Preconditions: The robot must be in the room and holding the object. Postconditions: The robot is no longer holding the object and is free, and the object is now in the room.

actions.name: throw_away
actions.description: The robot throws away a disposable object into a bin in a room. Arguments: robot, disposable object, bin, room. Preconditions: The robot must be in the room, holding the object, and the bin must be in the room. Postconditions: The robot is no longer holding the object and is free, the object is marked as thrashed, and the object is no longer in the room.

actions.name: mop_floor
actions.description: The robot mops the floor of a room using a mop. Arguments: robot, mop, room. Preconditions: The robot must be in the room, holding a clean mop, and the floor must be dirty. Postconditions: The floor is clean, the mop is dirty, and the mop is no longer clean.

actions.name: clean_mop
actions.description: The robot cleans a dirty mop. Arguments: robot, mop. Preconditions: The robot must be holding a dirty mop. Postconditions: The mop is clean and no longer dirty.

objects.description: A room in the house where cleaning tasks can be performed.
An object that can be located in a room, including robots, grabbable objects, and bins.
A robot that performs cleaning tasks.
An object that can be picked up by the robot, such as a mop.
A bin where disposable objects can be thrown away.
An object that can be thrown away, such as trash.
A cleaning tool that can be used to mop the floor.
